com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupDatePicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupDatePicker

  • public class ScupDatePicker
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a date widget for selecting a date.
    This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display using the base widget instead of this.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ScupDatePicker.DateChangeListener
      This listener interface is called when date is changed.

      • STYLE_MONTH_DAY_YEAR

        public static final int STYLE_MONTH_DAY_YEAR
        The ScupDatePicker style. The month information will be displayed first.
        See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScupDatePicker

        public ScupDatePicker(ScupDialog dialog,
              int style)
        Creates an ScupDatePicker instance.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog instance
        style - The ScupDatePicker style. It is one of STYLE_MONTH_DAY_YEAR or STYLE_YEAR_MONTH_DAY
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If style parameter is not STYLE_MONTH_DAY_YEAR and STYLE_YEAR_MONTH_DAY.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupDatePicker instance.
        If the ScupDatePicker is shown on the screen, ScupDatePicker should be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

      • setCurrentDate

        public void setCurrentDate(int month,
                  int day,
                  int year)
        Sets the current date information. this input date is displayed on spinner. If LAST_DAY is set to day. the current day is set to last day of current month.
        It can not allow lower than minimum date or higher than maximum date.The current data is not changed.
        Parameters:
        month - The month
        day - The day
        year - The year
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If month, day parameter is invalid.

      • getYear

        public int getYear()
        Gets the year This value can be different with device side. It synchronizes it's data on specific time. (For example, the action button is clicked)
        Returns:
        The year

      • getMonth

        public int getMonth()
        Gets the month This value can be different with device side. It synchronizes it's data on specific time. (For example, the action button is clicked)
        Returns:
        The month

      • getDay

        public int getDay()
        Gets the day This value can be different with device side. It synchronizes it's data on specific time. (For example, the action button is clicked)
        Returns:
        The day

      • setMinDate

        public void setMinDate(int month,
              int day,
              int year)
        sets the minimum day of DataPicker. If LAST_DAY is set to day. the current day is set to last day of current month.
        Parameters:
        month - The month
        day - The day
        year - The year
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If month, day parameter is invalid. Or the date is higher than maximum date.

      • setMaxDate

        public void setMaxDate(int month,
              int day,
              int year)
        sets the maximum day of DataPicker. If LAST_DAY is set to day. the current day is set to last day of current month.
        Parameters:
        month - The month
        day - The day
        year - The year
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If month, day parameter is invalid. Or The date is lower than minimum data.

      • setMonthExpression

        public void setMonthExpression(String[] texts)
        Set month text.
        The default is "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec".
        Parameters:
        texts - The month string array
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If strings parameter is null or the array size of texts is not 12.

      • getMonthExpression

        public String[] getMonthExpression()
        Gets the month expression
        Returns:
        The month string array.

      • setDateChangeListener

        public void setDateChangeListener(ScupDatePicker.DateChangeListener listener)
        Sets date change listener. Refer to ScupDatePicker.DateChangeListener
        Parameters:
        listener - The callback that will run
